trans-unit.source: Represents controls that visually expand to display content and collapse to hide content.
trans-unit.target: Representa os controles que visualmente expandem para exibir o conteúdo e recolher para ocultar o conteúdo.

trans-unit.source: Aggregate controls—built with child objects that provide the UI for expand/collapse functionality—must support the ExpandCollapsePattern control pattern while their child elements do not.
trans-unit.target: Controles agregados — criados com objetos filho que fornecem a interface do usuário para a funcionalidade de expandir/recolher — devem suportar o padrão de controle de ExpandCollapsePattern enquanto seus elementos filho não.

trans-unit.source: For example, a combo box control is built with a combination of list box, button, and edit controls, but it is only the parent combo box that must support the ExpandCollapsePattern.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, um controle de caixa de combinação é criado com uma combinação de caixa de listagem, um botão e controles de edição, mas é apenas a caixa de combinação pai que deve oferecer suporte a ExpandCollapsePattern.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > A menu control, even though an aggregate of individual menu items, is an exception to this rule.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Um controle de menu, mesmo que uma agregação de itens de menu individuais, é uma exceção a essa regra.

trans-unit.source: The menu items support the ExpandCollapsePattern control pattern, but the parent menu control does not.
trans-unit.target: Os itens de menu compatíveis com o padrão de controle de ExpandCollapsePattern, mas o controle de menu pai não.

trans-unit.source: A similar exception applies to the tree and tree item controls.
trans-unit.target: Uma exceção similar se aplica a árvore e controles de item de árvore.

trans-unit.source: Gets the cached [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.ExpandCollapsePattern"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o cache [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] valores de propriedade para este <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.ExpandCollapsePattern"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Cached property values must have been previously requested using a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>.
trans-unit.target: Valores de propriedade em cache devem ser anteriormente solicitados usando <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPattern.Current%2A> to get the current value of a property.
trans-unit.target: Use <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPattern.Current%2A>para obter o valor atual de uma propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPattern.Current%2A>

trans-unit.source: For information on the properties available and their use, see <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPattern.SelectionPatternInformation>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre as propriedades disponíveis e seu uso, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPattern.SelectionPatternInformation>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPattern.SelectionPatternInformation>

trans-unit.source: A structure containing the cached [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for the control pattern.
trans-unit.target: Uma estrutura que contém o cache [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] valores de propriedade para o padrão de controle.

trans-unit.source: The requested property is not in the cache.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade solicitada não está no cache.

trans-unit.source: Hides all descendant nodes, controls, or content of the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Oculta todos os nós descendentes, controles ou conteúdo do <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This is a blocking method that returns after the UI Automation element has been collapsed.
trans-unit.target: Esse é um método de bloqueio que retorna após o elemento de automação de interface do usuário foi recolhido.

trans-unit.source: There are cases when a UI Automation element that is marked as a leaf node might not know whether it has children until either the Collapse or the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ExpandCollapsePattern.Expand%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: Há casos em que um elemento de automação de interface do usuário que está marcado como um nó folha poderá não saber se ele tiver filhos até que o recolhimento ou <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ExpandCollapsePattern.Expand%2A>método é chamado.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.ExpandCollapsePattern.Expand%2A>

trans-unit.source: This behavior is possible with a tree view control that does delayed loading of its child items.
trans-unit.target: Esse comportamento é possível com um controle de exibição árvore que o carregamento atrasado de seus itens filho.

trans-unit.source: For example, [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winexpl](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-winexpl-md.md)] might display the expand icon for a node even though there are currently no child items; when the icon is clicked, the control polls for child items, finds none, and removes the expand icon.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winexpl](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-winexpl-md.md)] pode exibir o ícone de expansão de um nó, mesmo que no momento, não existem itens filho; quando você clica no ícone, o controle de pesquisa para itens filho, encontra nenhum e remove o ícone de expansão.

trans-unit.source: In these cases clients should listen for a property-changed event on the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ExpandCollapsePattern.ExpandCollapsePatternInformation.ExpandCollapseState%2A> property by registering an event handler with the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Automation.AddAutomationPropertyChangedEventHandler%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Nesses casos os clientes devem ouvir para um evento de propriedade alterada a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ExpandCollapsePattern.ExpandCollapsePatternInformation.ExpandCollapseState%2A>propriedade Registrando um manipulador de eventos com o <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Automation.AddAutomationPropertyChangedEventHandler%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Automation.AddAutomationPropertyChangedEventHandler%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.ExpandCollapsePattern.ExpandCollapsePatternInformation.ExpandCollapseState%2A>

trans-unit.source: Collapse is called when the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.ExpandCollapseState"></xref> = <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.ExpandCollapseState"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Recolher é chamado quando o <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.ExpandCollapseState"> </xref> = <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.ExpandCollapseState"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.ExpandCollapsePattern"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a atual [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] valores de propriedade para este <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.ExpandCollapsePattern"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This pattern must be from an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> with an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode> reference in order to get current values.
trans-unit.target: Esse padrão deve ser de um <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>com um <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode>referência para obter os valores atuais.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> was obtained using <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode>, it contains only cached data, and attempting to get the current value of any property raises an exception.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>foi obtida usando <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode>, ele contém somente dados armazenados em cache e tentar obter o valor atual de qualquer propriedade gera uma exceção.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ExpandCollapsePattern.Cached%2A> to get the cached value of a property that was previously specified using a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>.
trans-unit.target: Use <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ExpandCollapsePattern.Cached%2A>para obter o valor armazenado em cache de uma propriedade que foi previamente especificado usando um <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.ExpandCollapsePattern.Cached%2A>

trans-unit.source: For information on the properties available and their use, see <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ExpandCollapsePattern.ExpandCollapsePatternInformation>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre as propriedades disponíveis e seu uso, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ExpandCollapsePattern.ExpandCollapsePatternInformation>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.ExpandCollapsePattern.ExpandCollapsePatternInformation>

trans-unit.source: A structure containing the current [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for the control pattern.
trans-unit.target: Uma estrutura que contém atual [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] valores de propriedade para o padrão de controle.

trans-unit.source: Displays all child nodes, controls, or content of the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Exibe todos os nós filho, controles ou conteúdo do <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This is a blocking method that returns after the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> has been expanded.
trans-unit.target: Este é um método de bloqueio que retorna após o <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>foi expandido.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>

trans-unit.source: There are cases when a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>that is marked as a leaf node might not know whether it has children until either the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ExpandCollapsePattern.Collapse%2A> or the Expand method is called.
trans-unit.target: Há casos, quando um <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>que está marcado como um nó folha poderá não saber se ele tiver filhos até que o <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ExpandCollapsePattern.Collapse%2A>ou o método de expansão é chamado.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.ExpandCollapsePattern.Collapse%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>

trans-unit.source: This behavior is possible with a tree view control that does delayed loading of its child items.
trans-unit.target: Esse comportamento é possível com um controle de exibição árvore que o carregamento atrasado de seus itens filho.

trans-unit.source: For example, [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winexpl](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-winexpl-md.md)] might display the expand icon for a node even though there are currently no child items; when the icon is clicked, the control polls for child items, finds none, and removes the expand icon.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winexpl](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-winexpl-md.md)] pode exibir o ícone de expansão de um nó, mesmo que no momento, não existem itens filho; quando você clica no ícone, o controle de pesquisa para itens filho, encontra nenhum e remove o ícone de expansão.

trans-unit.source: In these cases clients should listen for a property-changed event on the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ExpandCollapsePattern.ExpandCollapsePatternInformation.ExpandCollapseState%2A> property by registering an event handler with the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Automation.AddAutomationPropertyChangedEventHandler%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Nesses casos os clientes devem ouvir para um evento de propriedade alterada a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ExpandCollapsePattern.ExpandCollapsePatternInformation.ExpandCollapseState%2A>propriedade Registrando um manipulador de eventos com o <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Automation.AddAutomationPropertyChangedEventHandler%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Automation.AddAutomationPropertyChangedEventHandler%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.ExpandCollapsePattern.ExpandCollapsePatternInformation.ExpandCollapseState%2A>

trans-unit.source: Expand is called when the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.ExpandCollapseState"></xref> = <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.ExpandCollapseState"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Expanda é chamado quando o <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.ExpandCollapseState"> </xref> = <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.ExpandCollapseState"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ExpandCollapsePattern.ExpandCollapsePatternInformation.ExpandCollapseState*> property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ExpandCollapsePattern.ExpandCollapsePatternInformation.ExpandCollapseState*>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.ExpandCollapsePattern.ExpandCollapsePatternInformation.ExpandCollapseState*>

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
trans-unit.target: Esse identificador é usado por aplicativos clientes de automação de interface do usuário.

trans-unit.source: UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ExpandCollapsePatternIdentifiers>.
trans-unit.target: Provedores de automação de interface do usuário devem usar o campo equivalente no <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ExpandCollapsePatternIdentifiers>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.ExpandCollapsePatternIdentifiers>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ExpandCollapseState> refers to the visibility of immediate child objects only; it does not refer to the visibility of all descendant objects.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ExpandCollapseState>refere-se a visibilidade dos objetos de filho imediatos. ele não faz referência a visibilidade de todos os objetos descendentes.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.ExpandCollapseState>

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ExpandCollapseState>.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ExpandCollapseState>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.ExpandCollapseState>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.ExpandCollapsePattern"></xref> control pattern.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.ExpandCollapsePattern"> </xref> padrão de controle.

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
trans-unit.target: Esse identificador é usado por aplicativos clientes de automação de interface do usuário.

trans-unit.source: UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ExpandCollapsePatternIdentifiers>.
trans-unit.target: Provedores de automação de interface do usuário devem usar o campo equivalente no <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ExpandCollapsePatternIdentifiers>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.ExpandCollapsePatternIdentifiers>

trans-unit.source: The pattern [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)] is passed to methods such as <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPattern%2A> to retrieve the control pattern of interest from the specified <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão de [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)] é passado para métodos como <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPattern%2A>recuperar o padrão de controle de interesse de <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> especificado</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPattern%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.
